glosses: right away, without delay, immediately, while the iron is hot

etymology: Inherited from Ottoman Turkish صیجاغی صیجاغینه (ṣıcaġı ṣıcaġına), from صیجاق (sıcaḳ), equivalent to sıcak (“hot, warm”) + -ı (possessive suffix) + sıcak + -ı (possessive suffix) + -(n)a (dative suffix with "n" as buffer consonant).
